Button order
Keep the button order consistent - we recommend that horizontally aligned button
groups have a trailing primary button, while vertical button groups have the primary
button at the top.
Vertical button groups

group.

test is to imagine if the icon itself could be recognised as the same action without
seeing the label. Avoid using icons as a device to draw attention or to decorate.
